Product Sku: 5852

reasons-why-christmas-5-heads-ceramic-mu.title: Reasons Why - Christmas (5 Heads) Ceramic Mug
reasons-why-christmas-5-heads-ceramic-mu.body:
Create a one of a kind gift for Mum, Dad, Grandma, Grandad, Godmother or Godfather with the Reasons Why Christmas Mug

• Available in Fine Bone China or Ceramic

  • Dishwasher and microwave safe (Warm Wash only in dishwasher)

• Ceramic Mug Holds 325 ml & the Bone China Mug Holds 295 ml.

How to personalise: 

  • Banner name - Enter the title (e.g. Mum, Grandma or Gran or Godmother etc.). Maximum 12 characters including spaces. 
  • Name 1 - Enter the name of the child with a limit of 9 characters.
  • Icon 1 - Select an icon for the child.
  • Repeat name and Icon steps if you have selected greater than 1 head designs.

Note: ‘Reason(s) ’ and ‘I love being a’ are printed automatically.

Please ensure that you enter a name for each icon you choose.

Click image for larger view and character icon codes for ordering.

vintage-christmas-sack-name.title: Vintage Christmas Sack - Name
vintage-christmas-sack-name.body:
Make Christmas special this year for both kids and adults with these gorgeous and authentic vintage sacks, just waiting to be filled with special gifts from Santa!

  • Drawstring closure keeps all gifts neat and under wraps
  • Measures 78cm H x 52cm W
  • Polyester

Personalisation:

  • Just enter your chosen name - Maximum of 12 characters including spaces.
  • The 'initial' and "IS FOR" are automatically printed on the sack.
  • The 'initial' will be the first letter of your chosen name.

Personalisation shown is an example only.
